cast.name: 麦丽凯.古奈尔 Melike Güner

introduction: After losing the woman he loves in the original Fig Jam, Metin (Halil Sezai Paracikoglu) finds himself seriously alone. His life is a repetitive round of singing at a bar and grieving for everything he has lost. Until, that is, Gizem appears out of nowhere... Gizem tells Metin that he needs to be someone, at least for at least for one person. Will these two people with so much pain and solitude in common be able to heal each other? Resounding with the songs of Halil Sezai Paracikoglu, Fig Jam 2 is both a contemporary love story and a tale of reconnecting with life...
